Introduction A task force to address strategy on cyber security in Iceland was appointed by the Ministry of the Interior in June 2013
Its main task is to formulate government strategy on cyber security and the protection of IT infrastructure elements that are relevant to national security i

The strategy is intended to address the protection of important elements of the infrastructure in Iceland and the responses called for
In view of the growing cyber-threats which pose a hazard to the government, the economy and the ordinary citizen
, The Internet has already become an integral part of the daily life of almost all people in Iceland and will continue to do so to an ever-greater degree
